comments:
With all the Europa projects loaded, I chose Help > Dynamic Help and these errors appeared in the error log:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.help.base 4 0 2007-05-22 19:07:33.343
!MESSAGE Error parsing cheat sheet extension from plug-in org.eclipse.cdt.doc.user, id org.eclipse.cdt-doc.cheatsheet.cdt_basic, file $nl$/org.eclipse.cdt.doc.user/cheatsheets/cs_cdt_basic.xml
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.help.search.LuceneSearchParticipant.resolveVariables(LuceneSearchParticipant.java:150)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.CheatsheetSearchParticipant.getAllDocuments(CheatsheetSearchParticipant.java:55)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.IndexingOperation.getAddedDocuments(IndexingOperation.java:376)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.IndexingOperation.execute(IndexingOperation.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.LocalSearchManager.updateIndex(LocalSearchManager.java:624)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.LocalSearchManager.ensureIndexUpdated(LocalSearchManager.java:598)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.federated.IndexerJob.run(IndexerJob.java:27)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.help.base 4 0 2007-05-22 19:07:33.343
!MESSAGE Error parsing cheat sheet extension from plug-in org.eclipse.cdt.doc.user, id org.eclipse.cdt-doc.cheatsheet.cdt_basic, file $nl$/org.eclipse.cdt.doc.user/cheatsheets/cs_cdt_import_project.xml
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.help.search.LuceneSearchParticipant.resolveVariables(LuceneSearchParticipant.java:150)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.cheatsheets.CheatsheetSearchParticipant.getAllDocuments(CheatsheetSearchParticipant.java:55)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.IndexingOperation.getAddedDocuments(IndexingOperation.java:376)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.IndexingOperation.execute(IndexingOperation.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.LocalSearchManager.updateIndex(LocalSearchManager.java:624)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.LocalSearchManager.ensureIndexUpdated(LocalSearchManager.java:598)
	at org.eclipse.help.internal.search.federated.IndexerJob.run(IndexerJob.java:27)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
I suggest to report the same issue also against Platform/Help to improve error handling and robustness in this area.

Moving target milestone to RC3, because the fix was incomplete. 
The build was missing the cheatsheets altogether.
Closing as Europa has been shipped.
